column2:
layout(matrix(c(1, 2), nrow=2), heights=c(1, 5))
par(mar=rep(0, 4))
plot.new()
text(x=0.5, y=0.5, "High Salary Job Minimum Skill Requirement")

          colors = brewer.pal(8, "Dark2"))
savePlot(file = './output/skill_req_highsalary.jpeg', type = 'jpeg')
